textBeforeTable: Read more Requirements for guest. No substance abuse. No noise after 10:00 am. A private Bachelors Apartment which consists of 1 room containing a Double Bed and a separate bathroom leading into private garden. Swimming pool. ( Pictures to be posted within a month). Available for full period of Soccer World Cup. This will suit a couple. ( 2 people) - all inclusive. Very Safe and Secure in Upper Class Area. Close to all amenities. Services Offered: Fully Serviced and Cleaned each day. Laundry done on a Daily Basic. Coffee and Tea supplied. Breakfast and Supper supplied. ( 2 meals per day. ) TV and DVD"s supplied. This is the original description by the host
